website_summaries.verdict: This premium adult bib delivers reliable mealtime protection with its generous dimensions, waterproof backing, and a built-in crumb catcher.
pros: Wide and long enough to provide full coverage
Poly-cotton outer layer absorbs spills, while the waterproof lining prevents liquids from penetrating and soiling clothes
Crumb catcher collects small food particles for a cleaner lap and seat
Velcro closure adjusts to fit most neck sizes
Holds up exceptionally well to washing
cons: Some users find it excessively long

customer_reviews.title: Buy THIS ONE!  The nicest one on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the neckline is so high. No food spills will drop underneath the bib as the bigger neck openings will. Also loved the crumb catcher on the bottom. Not just a gimmick, it really does work. BEST & nicest fabric I've found on ANY other adult bibs. Lightweight ease but works great --> no bulky or heavy fabrics. A great value, worth every penny!

SPILLS ARE ABSORBED BUT DON’T PENETRATE: Outer layer of poly/cotton absorbs liquids and spills. The vinyl Supplex backing is waterproof, yet light weight and breathable.
MACHINE WASHABLE AND DURABLE TO SAVE MONEY: takes dozens of washings-easy to clean and long lasting-saves money over cheap disposables.
